version_description:
inDriver теперь в Москве!

С новым обновлением, специально для Москвы, вы всегда найдете водителя! Наше приложение теперь сравнивает и находит самый удобный для вас вариант.
Также изменена форма регистрации водителей.

Нравится inDriver? Оцените приложение в AppStore. Ваши оценки помогают нам двигаться вперед. Если у вас возникли вопросы, напишите нам на support@indriver.ru

inDriver теперь в Москве!

С новым обновлением, специально для Москвы, вы всегда найдете водителя! Наше приложение теперь сравнивает и находит самый удобный для вас вариант.
Также изменена форма регистрации водителей.

Нравится inDriver? Оцените приложение в AppStore. Ваши оценки помогают нам двигаться вперед. Если у вас возникли вопросы, напишите нам на support@indriver.ru

Всем привет от команды inDriver!
В целях быстрой и удобной работы приложения мы продолжаем вносить небольшие улучшения и исправления, как и в этом обновлении.
Нравится inDriver? Оцените приложение в AppStore. Ваши оценки помогают нам двигаться вперед. Если у вас возникли вопросы, напишите нам на support@indriver.ru

Для водителей мы изменили уведомления о ближайшем заказе, добавили такие детали, как маршрут до пассажира и маршрут самого заказа, а также время в пути.
Внесли небольшие улучшения и исправления.

Нравится inDriver? Оцените приложение в AppStore. Ваши оценки помогают нам двигаться вперед. Если у вас возникли вопросы, напишите нам на support@indriver.ru

Всем привет от команды inDriver!

Добавили несколько улучшений, исправили баги и оптимизировали приложение.
Оставляйте отзывы, мы читаем каждый!

Всем привет от команды inDriver!
Добавили несколько улучшений, исправили баги и оптимизировали приложение.
Оставляйте отзывы, мы читаем каждый!

Всем привет от команды inDriver!
Добавили несколько улучшений, исправили баги и оптимизировали приложение.
Оставляйте отзывы, мы читаем каждый!

In this update we improved driver's version. To follow the changes of your priority became a lot easier, all you need is to switch the tabs on the main screen.
Now the passengers have to leave mandatory comments for the trip ratings of 3 or less.
Also we made performance updates and fixed small bugs.

You like? Leave us a comment, we read all of them

Greetings from inDriver team!
We updated review page and fixed some minor bugs and improved performance to make inDriver even more lit!
You like? Leave us a comment, we read all of them!

Greetings from inDriver team!

Now inDriver is in 5 countries, 120 cities and we have 9 million of users! This update arrives with new language support: Spanish and Portugese. Also we fixed some minor bugs and improved performance to make inDriver even more lit!
You like? Leave us a comment, we read all of them!

Now you can show on the map where you need to go. When will you need this? When you're not sure of the exact address but you still need to go, now you can show it on the map.

We know that few people read these updates, but we intend to continue to write them and improve our application :)
And if you have any ideas, feel free to email us, we read all of them!

Here is our new update, if you haven't noticed anything, then we did well.

We know that few people read these updates, but we intend to continue to write them and improve our application :)
And if you have any ideas, feel free to email us, we read all of them!

We added a few updates, fixed some minor bugs and improved performance to make inDriver even more lit!

Cheer for your team at World Cup and ride with inDriver :)

Greetings from inDriver team!
Today we updated ""My rides"" for drivers, we removed unnecessary info and added daily income statistics.
Update and try our app and leave us comments.
Every day we improve application for you, this time we fixed minor bugs and made small updates. Leave us a comment, we read all of them!

Kind reminder, now drivers are also able to rate passengers after each ride. These reviews affect the rating of the passenger. The higher passenger's rating, the higher the probability that the driver will choose his offer.

Merry Christmas from inDriver!

We wish you fun rides and many unforgettable moments!

This year was eventful for the company, inDriver is now in 14 countries and more than 180 cities worldwide and is used by 14 million users who have made more than 180 million rides.

Next year expect a lot of new features and a long-awaited surprise for drivers, can someone guess?

p.s. Our designers are very fond of Xmas so with this update you will notice Xmas icons :)

We making our app better every day:
- We done some minor changes in Request history
- Introduced time-out for ride review screen
- Added new countries to choose
- Other minor fixes
Enjoy!

Also free waiting time is available at driver's arrival screen.

Now inDriver is used by more than 20 million people worldwide!

Thank you for using our app :)

Hello!

inDriver team wishes you a Happy New Year!

We hope you will have lots of fun and profitable rides, as well as many happy moments in the new decade!

This year has proved to be rather eventful and exciting. inDriver is now represented in 31 countries, in more than 300 cities around the world, and we have 38 million users who have already completed over 400 million rides.

Next year promises to be no less memorable, since every day we are working on making the application even better for you.

P.S. In keeping with tradition, our developers added the vibe of the winter festivities to the application, and we once again decided to brighten your season up with New Year's icons :)

Hi everyone from the inDriver team!

The first update of the new decade is out. We've added some improvements and fixed some minor bugs.
If you have any ideas, mail us and give us your comments: We read them all!

Thanks for staying with us into 2020!

Greetings from inDriver team!

Every day we improve application for you, this time we fixed minor bugs and made small updates.

Leave us a comment, we read all of them!

Hi from inDriver team!

We have new feature update for you.
Now you're able to hide ride requests from unwanted users.

If you didn’t like the driver or passenger,
you can block the user.
After the ride is completed rate user with one star,
and tap on the "Stop showing" button.

Have you already tried our the new feature?
Share your experience with us!

Hello!


Here's our new update. If you haven't noticed anything, it means we did our job well.


By the way, if you have any thoughts or ideas, please share them with us. Just shoot us an email, and we'll gladly get in touch with you!

inDriver is heading into 2021 with over 50 million users!

Together we’ve covered 2,220,478,083 kilometres this year! That’s the same as 55,408 trips around the equator, 5,776 trips to the moon, or 15 trips to the sun!

Use inDriver to stay nearest to your dearest at this magical time.
Our team is always around and ready to help.

Stay healthy, stay happy! Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

P.S. As per our annual tradition, we’ve spruced up our app to get you excited for the holidays.
